# Colonial Staff
[color=#9fed58]Service Workers[/color] keeps the station clean, efficient and sane so that all other departments can do their jobs better and keep their staff happy. They also end up doing most of the paperwork on the station.
## Personnel [color=#9fed58]Service Workers[/color]'s is composed of Chefs, Botanists, Bartenders, Janitors, Chaplains, and Lawyers. All of which is ran and ordered by [color=#1b67a5]Overseer.[/color]
## Working Together [color=#9fed58]Service Workers[/color], despite being the most diverse, tends to be the most [color=#a4885c]interlinked[/color] role by far. Most [color=#9fed58]Service Workers[/color] jobs require [color=#a4885c]cooperation[/color] between workers. Chefs often need ingredients that only botanists can grow efficiently. The bartender may request ammonia that the janitor keeps in their personal storage rooms for later off shift use. The lawyer may invite the mime to play charades to convince the judge that their client is innocent.
A lot of [color=#a4885c]collaboration[/color] is necessary within and without [color=#9fed58]Service Workers[/color].
